name: Chili Mac
author: Sargento
summary: Add a little spice to this comfort food favorite, by sprinkling on Sargento Shredded Reduced Fat 4 Cheese Mexican Cheese. Ole!
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can Mexican or chili-style stewed tomatoes, undrained
2 cups elbow macaroni or small shells, cooked and drained
2 cups Sargento ® Shredded Reduced Fat 4 Cheese Mexican Cheese, divided
directions: Cook ground beef, onion and green pepper in large skillet over medium heat 5 minutes or until beef is no longer pink; pour off drippings
Add tomatoes, water and  ; simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally
Spoon 3 cups of mixture into an 11x7-inch baking dish
Sprinkle with 1 cup cheese; top with remaining meat mixture
Cover with foil; bake in preheated 375 degrees F oven 30 minutes
Return to oven 5 minutes or until cheese is melted
